trans-unit.source: Represents the text content of an element or attribute.
trans-unit.target: 表示項目或屬性的文字內容。

trans-unit.source: The content of the node; see the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlText.Value" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 節點的內容；請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlText.Value" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The parent XML document.
trans-unit.target: 父代 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlText" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlText" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Do not instantiate an <xref:System.Xml.XmlText> directly; instead, use methods such as <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateTextNode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請勿執行個體化<xref:System.Xml.XmlText>直接; 相反地，使用方法例如<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateTextNode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; <see langword="false" /> to clone only the node itself.
trans-unit.target: 若要在指定的節點下遞迴地複製子樹狀結構，則為 <see langword="true" />；若只要複製節點本身，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of this node.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個節點的複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned node.
trans-unit.target: 複製的節點。

trans-unit.source: `CloneNode` serves as a copy constructor for nodes.
trans-unit.target: `CloneNode` 可做為節點的複製建構函式。

trans-unit.source: For text nodes, the cloned node always includes the data value.
trans-unit.target: 對於文字節點，複製的節點永遠會包含資料值。

trans-unit.source: To see how this method behaves with other node types, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A> method in the `XmlNode` class.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看這個方法的行為與其他節點型別，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A>方法中的`XmlNode`類別。

trans-unit.source: The cloned node has no parent (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returns `null`).
trans-unit.target: 複製的節點有沒有父代 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A>傳回`null`)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the local name of the node.
trans-unit.target: 取得節點的區域名稱。

trans-unit.source: For text nodes, this property returns <see langword="#text" />.
trans-unit.target: 對於文字節點，這個屬性傳回 <see langword="#text" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the qualified name of the node.
trans-unit.target: 取得節點的限定名稱。

trans-unit.source: For text nodes, this property returns <see langword="#text" />.
trans-unit.target: 對於文字節點，這個屬性傳回 <see langword="#text" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: For text nodes, this value is XmlNodeType.Text.
trans-unit.target: 對於文字節點，這個值為 XmlNodeType.Text。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of this node (for nodes that can have parents).
trans-unit.target: 取得這個節點的父代 (對於具有父代的節點而言)。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlNode" /> that is the parent of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 目前節點的父代的 <see langword="XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: If a node has just been created and not yet added to the tree, or if it has been removed from the tree, the parent is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果剛剛建立節點而尚未加入至樹狀結構中，或者已經從樹狀結構中移除，則父代為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For all other nodes, the value returned depends on the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType" /> of the node.
trans-unit.target: 對於其他所有節點，傳回的值視節點的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType" /> 而定。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the possible return values for the <see langword="ParentNode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述 <see langword="ParentNode" /> 屬性的可能傳回值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text node that immediately precedes this node.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個節點的前置文字節點。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The offset at which to split the node.
trans-unit.target: 分隔節點的位移。

trans-unit.source: Splits the node into two nodes at the specified offset, keeping both in the tree as siblings.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的位移將這個節點分隔成兩個節點，使這兩個節點在樹狀中都保持同層級 (Sibling)。

trans-unit.source: The new node.
trans-unit.target: 新節點。

trans-unit.source: After `SplitText` is called, the original node contains all the content up to the offset point.
trans-unit.target: 之後`SplitText`呼叫時，原始節點包含到位移的時間點的所有內容。

trans-unit.source: A new node of the same type contains all the content at and after the offset point and is inserted as the next sibling of the original node.
trans-unit.target: 相同類型的新節點會包含在和位移的時間點之後的所有內容，且會插入做為原始節點的下一個同層級。

trans-unit.source: When the offset is equal to the length of this node, the new node has no data.
trans-unit.target: 當位移為等於這個節點的長度時，新的節點會有任何資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the node.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定節點的值。

trans-unit.source: The content of the text node.
trans-unit.target: 文字節點的內容。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlWriter" /> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存的目標 <see langword="XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves all the children of the node to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 將此節點的所有子系儲存到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="XmlText" /> nodes do not have children, so this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="XmlText" /> 節點沒有子系，所以這個方法不會有任何效果。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlWriter" /> to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存的目標 <see langword="XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves the node to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 將節點儲存至指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。
